Well i'm gonna try and get other mexico people to do this thing. It's sorta just to tell our experiences and anything else we want to share.

did my testimony, it was pretty good actually. Did the play and that turned out good. It was a fun time really. I was suprised. I was really feling like junk but it was kewl. I'm looking forward to the race 2morrow. im gonan bite but hey i'll do my best.

ahhh yeah just a tad boring today and some stuff to go that i don't wanna do. church was so so. vernon has been teaching the old way by standinh up talking the entire time. The fact is i have some trouble paying attetion. I was gettin' just a lil sleepy. oh by the way Vernon is my youth leader/teacher at church. But yeah. I had wayyy 2 many donuts to eaty this morning wow i musta had like six. but neway so church was borin'. I have to go back 2night for a church dinner thingy where i perfrom a nondialouge show called Redeemer. Then i have to do my testimony. and i don't liek public speaking. I mean c'mon techie here. That's another reason i don't act 2 nervous. I could be decent at it i guess but whatever. So just another fun night, and i wnated to go to bed early conisdering i have a race 2morrow. Oh well. You'll see how 2night turns out l8er.

So yeah FRIDAY!! OK so here's my weekend saturday sunday and monday off from schoo. tuesday is my d.c. trip with my chem and lit classes. Then wednesday im skipping cause it's a crappy field trip that day, but i am going to rehersal that afternoon, conisdering the biffs are two days after that. but today was a bore. French we watched cirque de soleil, acting i we talked, geo quiz, AP modern art debate, 6/7th watched movie trailers on the projectors and MAD tv stuff. funny, some people didn't liek MAD TV. its ok i mean its funny but you gotta be in the mood for it. im gonna go enjoy my weekend. au revoir mon ami. I GOTTA SEE KILL BILL VOL 2.

Yeahhhh so. I went to bed at 8 but was still dead tired when i woke up. AHH passed my chem SOL and my AP SOL with like a 550 or somethin. pretty good really. Did nothing 2day again. Driver's ed video about abusive dating was hilarous. such bad acting it's funny. ummm french off subject. I did focus lights during Acting I. I was gonna finish after school but the band was set up for tonight's concert, which i think i'll go to. I mean they do pit band for drama we gotta go to their stuff. Ohh and i just finished my group's DC presentation. Field trip tuesday and we had to present the places we're going to. I spiced it up a bit. It's appelaing to the eyes at least. 2MORROW IS FRIDAY!! And i gotta run this weekend or i will die monday. yeah the race. 6.2 miles. and it's part of a series of races so i could like get a trophy if i do all the races. im gonna try and do that. well gonna get ready for the concert. thanks 4 reading.

Took chemistry SOL 2day. Easy. yeah no suprise there. umm one-acts are coming along. slowly but steadily. i just really gotta get lines. been lazy bout it. I have a race thingy monday but it's only 10k. I have no time to train for it so im gonna suck. Hopefully after the one acts i can like run everyday if possible. i wanna do good this year and it'd be soooo kewl to go to states. i think i can do it. hopefully, we'll see. i cannot for school to end. it's monotonus. OH AND I FINALLY GOT THE GENIE!! after much diffculty gettting it on the elevator, piece of crap. ummm yeah im gonna go watch my Farscape DVD now. see ya.

OK. school well school sucked. it was boring, drivers ed slept, frehc daydreamed, acting I slept, geo daydreamed, AP movie, 6 and 7 daydreamed. yeah school after SOL"s. well still chem but that SOL is wednesday. um Biff finally got the genie. HALLEUJAH. i start focusing 2morrow. work work work. that's gonna take up alot o' time. plus the one acts. it'll be intresting. the stress again. YEAH. haha no. but i'll do it cause tech is the best. oh and my car is AWESOME. i didn't think it was mine when my mom cam and picked me up in it 2 day. hehe. im out. may chemistry die.

well i drove my car 2 day. it'll take some getting used to. just different and faster. otherwise i'v really done nothing 2 day. though i need to. hw. lines, could read a book. whatever. school is almost over. such a waste of time after the SOL's. oh and underworld is so so. lots o backplot hard 2 follow.

yeah so my parents threw me a suprise b-day parrt, a week after it. it was very well planned expect Eugenia sorta ruined it for me. but i really didn't think i was gonna have one cause it was after my b-day party. plus they got me a car already. which the suprise was alos ruined for me by Katherine. some ppl really cannot keep a suprise. it was fun tho. and i was somehwat suprised by the car, which is awesomwe. and we all swam in the freezing water and me and casey drank figi water out of wine glasses. a fun night.

yeah so i really hate chemistry. so frelling boring. more wk's and a stupid quiz. and i reallllyyyy don't like david's play. well i dunno he's so jumpy he needs to be definitive and stuff ya know. it's like we got NOTHING done 2day. i mean sorta but we'll 4 get it by 2morrow. whatever. im looking forward to dustin's one act. that'll be a fun one. NOT 2 LONG TILL IT BE OVER. YEAHHHHHH. school that is.

Yeah i've done one of these before, but only did one posting so maybe i'll do better with this one. name is dan, or doctor dan, or daniel, or any other nuckname that might exist but not Bill (and if you don't know why i hate it don't ask). Uhhhh yeah. so im in three one acts. not planning on that. it'll be kool tho i just hafta work out that and lights. not an easy task. amazing im not a fan of acting yet i did both audition days. it'll be fun, i think. riken is in my washington d.c. group thingy, we're thinking of ways to get rid of him. he wouldn't be bad well nm. well that's it for now.
im gone til huly 3 so no new postings till then cause im internetless!!! atrocious crime. BYE JENNIFER BYE JACQUELINE!!

So i stayed home from my church worship team practice to see some friends of my mom and dad whom i sorta know BUT THEY show up at like 9:30 30 minutes afterwards so a perfectly good tuesday night wasted. uhhh. im trying to see ppl b4 i leave for mexic friday but i dunno. at least i'll see jq and jenn. maybe jenny. i dunno what the timing is AND ALL THAT JAZZ. i have to wake at 7 30 2morrow 2 , x-c. gotta start running more. i gotta run my butt off b4 mexico. and there2. i hoep i don't like die or something from the water. only bottled for me i guess. im gonna go now. nothing to do till one when my show comes on. oh wellllllllllllllllllllllllll.

the thrid one is realllyyyyyy long. I mean three hours passed by and i thought it had ended like 5 times but it didn't still good tho. the funny thing is alot of christians like LOTR a movie with magic and stuff and guy who comes back from the dead but harry potter is evil!! think about it.

bought some 50 dolkar dvd editing, burning software for ohhhh one dollar. yeah major coupons and it works pretty good i think it may burn some crap my other CRAPPY programs wouldn't. die microsoft for leading me on when i bought this computer.!!!!

new farscape miniseries later this year!! even tho i haven't finsihed watching the dvd collection i heard ther's like season cliffhanger thingy so they have to resolve that. but hey they're brigning it back, eveen if it only for like 5 eps.

bore bore bore. yeah it sucked oh well. did nothing but since i drove there and back i got 40 bucks outta it. but still it sucked. i needa a job still and i misses a a mexico team meeting, they really have to tell me these things.

I SHOULD BE SLEEPING but no compnay picnic today and we should be gone but omse guy won;t be ready till eleven. i got ready in 5 MINUTES!! with a shower. i'd much rather be doin nething else. i'd mow to miss this horrendus event. oh well. and jq and jenn i gotta call ya'll today and do somethin.

yeahhh so im frickin bored. did nothing today but turn in some applications really. slept in till 12. can;t do that 2morrow. COMPANY BEGOTTEN PICNIC!! EVIL THING. oh and katherine U SUCK. i think my site is very intresting. crap 4got to call jq, oh well me and her and jenn HAFTA do somethin 2morrow or it'll be sad. in one week i'll be on a plane to mexico!! ah ha. thats gonna be weird. whatever. i gonna go do somethin. bye. oh NO A GIANT MAN EATING SNAKE. is that exciting enuff kat

yeahhhh so ym parents wouldn't lemme drive to practice so i RAN to practice!! it's only a mile and half i know but still. I was late so i ran to coach so i prolly ran like 2.5 miles. i suckkkk soooooo much right now it's bad. so i gotta get reallly into it every day till well i should never stop. i want sub 18. that'd be sooooo kewl. but whatever. we played kickball and my team lost miserably. i got home like 30 minutes ago. it was a fun practice. im gonna go keep talkin to people. peace yo!
i just posted my permanet pic and it sucks. im not usually that grumpy so im gonna hafta get a better one. so don;t think that's me ALL the time. just during lecture hall classes.

i went out with jenny and julie today. that was kewl it was intresting. we went to bank and i got money and we drove my car there and then we got her car again cause we were only supposed to drive it to barnes and noble but we didn't and i lied to ym mom about that but she figured it out l8er. but after that we did go to barnes and noble and i didn't eat nething. there were actually books I wanted but i gotta save money. Once i get a job i'll have to buy some. we went out to o'charley's and only i ate and it was pretty good. then we went to CVS and i dropped off some digital pics. then we went home cause there was nothing playing at the dollar theatre. was going with jq and jenn but it didn't work out. i think we're doing somethin 2morrow. not a very productive day really. there's a x-c thingy today. palladino (coach) sent me an e-mail. i hope he told other ppl cause i dunno ne1 on the x-c team really as friends. im gonna grab some rice crispy treats now.

yeah i was bored but i got over it pretty fast i guess. but it sucked. i got shoes today for running. my feet keep falling asleep after the third mile of any of my runs. the guy said if this happens with new shoes i had better go see a doctor. yeahh that's really suck. i went to a different CVS today to get my pics developed and it sucked. no enlargements and they were way busy and had like no one working there. should have asked if they were hiring. 2morrow i go job searching. Im gonna try kroger, dad said wal-mart)maybe), CVS(the one i like), maybe target, and AE for sure, Aero if i can. And anywhere else i feel like. i gotta go. i think im eating now. maybe next week i'll tell you about my crappy job.
urlLink Me lookin like an idiot

just woke up and im feeling pretty good oh its about 2 somethin now. im going on some x-c thingy today. running swimming etc. im tired of swimming its all i have done thins weekend, maybe i can get a tan or somethn. whatever. listen to sondre lerche. he's good.

yeahhh lock in at the lake was greta but i did sleep. I went swimming at three am and talked with friends and crap. it was fun. i'll even put in a picture to show you HOW MUCH FUN IT WAS. church was kewl. ummmm, sorta bored now botu to go to Casey's graduation party. I'm gonna buy some figi water. sorry you don't understand, e-mail me and i will tell you the story. gotta go now. BYE

went into school for two hours to take my driver's ed exam. piece of cake. it was such a waste of time. ummm. ate at biscuitville which was realllyyy good. mainly i have just wasted the day and i go to a lock in thingy today. i'm just glad it be over. sooooo long school is. im gonna go do somethin. else. IT'S OVER

well chemistry well it was o.k. it could have been wayyyyyy harder. I got a 92.3 with the 20 points extra. if only i had gottten thirty!!! but it brought my grade up alot. lit was so so. could a been worse. I think i did fine. overall i think i'll get like 4 b semester grades and 3 A's. I'll hafta pick it up next year. my rank is prolly gonna go down 2. whatever. 1 more exam to go in driver's ed yeahhh. come to think of it i should have taken my geometry exam, could have gotten an A. oh well.

2 days left with 3 exams to go. Chemistry and lit to go, my hardest ones and i dunno what to study for em. I Hope i paid attetion cause' i need an 80 on my chemistry exam for it not to harm me, but i do get 20 extra points from the SOL so a 60 is what i need to do not to hurt myself but with a 100 i get like an 87 average which is a B so i wouldn't have a C grade for the semester. I went to Dolores house to say goodbye but she wasn't there, she's going back to Estonia. cry cry. i made her a cd with american music cookies and muffins. great present huh? well i should study or i will fail. bye y'all. EAT COOKIES!!

French was sorta hard i did educated guesses which i suck at but im hopin for a B. Acting I got an 88 B but i didn't study so eh. We cleaned up afterward (the theatre) and talked alot and joked around.AND THIS STUPID ATTEDANCE PEOPLE. Biff never sent in attendance so they kept calling and he wasn't there. so the fifth call i said yes we know the attendance isn't it he's not here sorry goodbye. then we he got here they called again and the person on the phone said a young women. what the hect? do i sound like a girl the answer is NO. They're like the IRS never ever give up. But when we left Acting I it's all sad cause we all went different ways. it was so symbolic. and yeah got 2morrow off then lit and CHEMISTRY. uhhhhhhhh. cramin for that one. for now i'm gonna go enjoy my tuesday.

went to Audrey's graduation short that was very good cause im sick and wow i hate being sick because i am never sick. The BIffs were tonight and i did win Best Stage Manager which was all i wanted really. It was fun and lots o laughs. Ate and drank and joked and sang. That's my day. au revoir.

Saw my bro play baseball, depressing. not him but his team. they really bite, but they did try. I read Arthur Miller's All My Sons during the game so I didn't see everything wrong that happened. I skipped school 2day which was great slept in, but i did go to rehersal today. I did Dustin's first, people still do not know their frelling lines. In Casey's play nobody ever show's up and when we finally did everybody talks the entire time so i get pissed off and go stage manager on em'. And they finally do shut up. ANd we got somethin' done. Friday will be the one acts! I go to school 2morrow. cry cry. oh well only two days and i gotta pick out a costume for the biffs. I really dunno what to be. I'll hafta figure somethin' out. Maybe a frog. or a doctor. ya know i should be a doctor. Doctor Dan! Why not use my trump card. well thaz it.

till i can drive. xc was short but b4 that behind the wheel was boring. one guy didn't show up at all. so the other guy in the car did 2 lessons, and i did one. i suck at backing into a parking spot. man i hit the wall. whatever. i slept after my turn, we were on rural roads and there was nothing to really look at. but somehow we got to sheetz and i woke up and the guy is like wow u sleept alot, and well yeah that's all there is to do.

Saw the Village and yes i was a tad dissapointed. I just well expected more and well i wasn't as freaked out as i wanted to be. But overall i think it was a decent film, better than the crap that is out there. Well that was 2night. Behind the wheel as easy, highway driving. just put it on a cruise and change course now and then. Then when the other guy went I slept quite well. Then xc camp was fun. Did the frisbee golf course and played ultimate firsbee, and hyperextented my wrist. still sore. oh well.
yeah so trying to get acting I together 2morrow to go see a movie but it ain't working well. i dunno i hope at least 4 of them show. whatever.

OK. it is not worth the $0.75 i spent on it when looking at the plot and mere content of it. BUT!! If you love laughing at horrible HORRIBLE movies and hate teen cliches, or cliches PERIOD!! Then you'll love it. It' so horrible you must laugh it. I mean do a commentary during the movie with a friend and predict what they're going to say or do, and 99.9 % of the time you will be correct!! I am going to buy this DVD. just for it's sheer horridness. it was worse than Hidalgo.

well the ride wasn't as long as I thought and the person who drove me (debbie) is pretty kewl, only knew eher through my mom but she's nice and pretty friendly. Plus i like her car. Umm i got home and watched tv programs missed and some dvd's in the mail. then i went to Toyko to eat, yeah my mom is letting me drive by myself again. HEY i am at home alone after all. Saw jqs car and alot of others at aarons. eh im being nosey. defintley none of my businness. kat came over and she showed me her car and ate some sandwiches by the pool. 2morrow is x-c camp. AND FERRIS (drving instructor) YOU KEEP FRELLING THINGS UP. i have my driivng test starting thursday during x-c camp. so i'll be an hr late for xc thursday and friday. at least i won't miss offical practice, it doesn't start for a couple of weeks. oh well, get it over with quicker. im going to go do other stuff. im prolly not going to sleep till like 4 so u can call me if ur reading this now like right now today that is. I AM HOME ALONE!!

so it's 12:23 I WOKE up about 23 mins ago. clock said it was 1, that's why i woke up, but it was wrong. SO NY was great. I mean if i did plays there i could seriously live there. It's always busy. FAST. i hate slow. Always stuff to do. Sops everywhere. AND BROADWAY SHOWS OF COURSE!! I mean i was out with my family till like 12 am every night imagine what me and my friends could do!! jq and jenn!! muahaha. just gimme some pixie sticks. Chicago was GREAT!! Paige Davis from trading spaces was Roxie, she was suprisingly good, altho i do think she laughed 2 much. And Heritage's Mr. Cellophane was way better!!! The lights and the sound were awesome i mean i always heard them ALL clearly. The seats sorta sucked, they were to the side, but i still saw everything just fine. I was practically wording every song and their lines. Sad how i still know that crap from sming (stage managing) it in MARCH. arg. well i do believe i am going home 2 day so when i am home i will blog and then go out!!! I missed my friends so i am determined to go out EVERY night this week. so u be my friend reading this CALL ME with something to do and i'm gonna do it.
SO. we're not leaving 2day for NY. Weird huh? But that's my family. slept till only 1:30 2day, i was proud of my self. Only 3 days until CHICAGO!!!!! WOo HOo!!
holst is defintley one of my favorite modern classical composers. forgot how good he was.

Seriosuly all i wanted today was to be left alone in my room just doing stuff like tv, reading, etc. I just didn't want to interact socially, AT ALL!! BUT no. no no no no no. (if u know Chicago then where is that one from!!?) My parenst practically forced me out to the movies, by myself. That's another reason i didn't want to go. I mean they gave me a like 30 minute warning. I think they just wanted some alone time or something. I really don't know. But seriously who goes to a movie alone?? I mean it was a decent movie cause i'm into Sci-fi to a point (it was Chronicles of Riddick by the way). And every1 is away that i would usually call to go out and crap. Kat no anser, jq n GA, jenn in some college. And every1 else sorry i didn't call BUT i mean i didn't want to be rude and call you without that much notice cause those three ppl i really don't care what they think so i would'y feel awkward asking them. But maybe enxt time i'll think of you, i was clouded by anger and my antisocial mood. Yeah so there's that. Dad is back 2day, picked him up. Ummmm, they finally did a commerical about Farscape the Peacekeeper Wars on Sci-Fi. can't wait till that comes in October. I'm leaving tuesday for NY. We're staying two days there now AND we're going to virignia beach and maryland. MY dad can be awesome, sometimes. I'm still a teenager and entitled to really dislike my parents. I know im rambling but i'll keep on going. MUAHA. Steph was gone 2day and i never really realized how i know her the best OUT OF THE ENTIRE YOUTH GROUP!! Cause i was there 2day and it was like freaky w/o her cause she's always there and stuff. So yeah Steph sadly enuff (hehe) you're important. AND I CALLED YOU TODAY. and you weren't answering. so you better of checked your voicemail. so i am out of things to write. my last post for a while will be 2morrow. but hey it's New york they gotta have cyber cafe's right? If neone from NY reads it e-mail me if they do and where. yeah right some1 from NY is gonna read this long post. AND a pat on the back for me. this is my longest post EVER!! au revoir. man i had a bad french teacher.
wow hotels there are expenisive like woah. and brothers suck alot. idiot.
well i did wake up earlier and do xc around like 12 or so. nothing to really do today. i have to clean and stuff. that's my mission for the day. i'll have to find something to do today.

Yeah so we talked and we don't want to go to Florida now (family) SO we're going to go to New York and we're gonna see Chicago on Broadway and maybe something else. But I'm finally going to New York. Oh yeah for 2day SODA and i drove to subway still without a license hahah. and then i saw Spiderman-2. I liked it. Very nice. Altho i don't think it was worth 7 bucks, me and my impatience.

ok so i woke up and with my mom dropped the SUV to get fixed. when i got home round 9 i slept, till one. ouch. this was one of those days 2 do nothing. then when i go to my brother's game cause she has to drive me to XC practice,a lightening storm. end of story me no go to XC but me and her go to Olive garden. very good. liked the atmosphere the best. 2morrow i go 2 SODA training. ugh longggg day that'll be. oh and Philip dsf.fjkdsio.jfsd;oifjsfld.
urlLink philip he's strange
urlLink AHAHAHA i look like an idiot. (in mexico)

SO went to church 2day and all. Ran the projection system. WAY WAY easy. altho i did screw up once or twice. but otherwise easy. Youth group was awesome 2 day. SHERRY WAS BACK. and if u don't know sherry is the biggest kid altho she is sorta an adult in our group. she's been gone 2 long. ummmmmmmmmmm. went back to practice 2day for puppets. got nothing done as usual. altho i did have some wonderful cake. wow that was good. dad went to crystal river in FL 2day. HE LET ME DRIVE HIM THERE TO THE AIRPORT I MEAN!! and so i actually drove by my self. And it was fun. I went fast round curves that was kewl. BUT after that i was home alone till like 9'o clock so i watched some DVD"S and got work done. so a somewhat boring day but not really. swam by myself, and yeah it's more fun than with people.

yeah so. i woke up at eight to do the trash but my mom already did it. SO i was like whatever, she wakes up to early. Then i sleep till like one. Ferris (he's the guy that's gonna give me my driver's exam) called and tried to chnage my times BUT we're gonna be in Florida and i have cross country in the morning. oh yeahh so today all i did was go 2 church and learn how 2 to work the projection systems which means i have to skip youth group every now and then. which is really fine by me!!!! and then I DROVE OH YEAH DROVE ILLEGALLY home but not without getting a bahama sno shack thingy first. darn those things are good. FEELS LIKE A FRIDAY!! Cross country meet 2morrow at my house. that's gonna be intresting!!!!! LIVE JOURNAL IS FOR LOSERS EUGENIA!!! oh an Eugenia happy b-day. Sorry i didn't get u nething today, mom didn't wanna take me out. lazy lazy lazy.

yeah currently i can't log on to my dashboard for blogger and no e-mail with a resoultion so far. so im not liking blogger so much right now. I did FINALLY go out today. Saw a movie and then went out for some ice cream. The movie was lonnggg and the ice cream from DQ was quite good. AHHH. XC this morning at 7:30 am. It was just really early for running. We did like 2.5 at peaks view park. I ran with ben emily anna and randy (OUTTA SHAPE) We stopped so many times. UGH!! Next practice i pick it up though. I've gotten better suprisingly. HAHAHAH!! NEVER AGAIN CHRIS WYATT NEVER AGAIN!!!

Welllll. I woke up way late today around two o' clock. I did nothing, seriosuly. I tried to fix the computer and watched some shows i recorderd the week i was gone. I ran today at jefferson street and I WAS BAD!! But i didn't stop. And i gotta call acting one 2night and try to do the whole movie theatre thing. I dunno. Whatever. I may blog l8er 2night. whatever.

hey well i got back yesterday from mexico. eventually im gonna make a blog about it and maybe get other people on it and we'll tell our mexico stories. but there's way 2 much 2 write. just happy to be back and in my own COMFY BED!!! woo woo.
ok so i can;t own an apartment i can only RENT ONE. thank you jq .

I hate lawnmowers. I really really do. And I hate it more when my parents force me to do. It's so stupid. The yard looked fine but no, we had to do some medial things that supposedly make the lawn look better. My dad Edward scissorhands practically killed the shrubs. I will own an apartment when I move out, so much easier.

troy was so so. i mean i guess i just wasn't impressed. but still good. worth the buck fifty i paid. ummm family time, enuff for the rest of the year. only 12 days till' i can drive by myself. looking forward to that, im gonna stay out like allllll day from xc to like 12 am. still haven't watched my farscape dvd's. i need to do that. i HAVE to read 2morrow. if i don't, i'm gonna be screwed.

so um i am a sucker for Sci-fi shows and well i was bored outta my mind and well an old show Called Roswell is having a marathon on it and it really isn't that good a show but it combines a drama with teens and sci-fi so i am suckered in and that's what i've done all afternoon. passed my driver's test, easy. and i got a physical. it only took 2.5 hours to get the darn thing. going out with family, ugh. i'd rather stay home and watch t.v. i guess im just tired of the whole family time thing. i just well, i dunno. im tired of em', still love em' but whatever. oh dido here with me good song. roswell opener

yeah so aftre the wjole behind the wheel, we went to the mall. i got 2 jeans and 2 shirts for 63 bucks, not bad for AE trust me there. mom took 4ever to get into AE, i was in there waitng for at least 20 mins after i finished looking at the stuff i wanted. then to chik-fil-a, got some food. Becca' was there to and Charles. they looked to be doing good. gotta invite her over and brittney to swim sometime. ummm then to kroger and got watermelons for the xc team and one was rotten so we got our money back. then to the post office and i sent PRIORITY MAIL to the cc camp in western virginia, they should get it wednesday. just a reminder that i'm here, and not all that happy about it. uhhh bought a mattress comforter thingy, went home lazed round. went to xc and did hard stuff, i've done better. um still no book reading. so very sad. i have to do it so i think i'll take it with me to behind the wheel 2morrow. tired now, prolly going to bed earlier. maybe not. im hoping to get the season 4 finale farscape dvd's 2morrow. those are the LAST ONES. i'll be finsihed with farscape, until october and they do the miniseries. church ppl i miss you, way way much.

woke up at 6:30 am for behind the wheel, the other guy driivng scares me, he can't. i ate breakfest durign our break at sheetz and then played on my cell. got my mom's phones reactivted AND we may get a new plan that gives me caller id, voice mail, three way calling, messaging. THANK GOODNESS. yea basic features i kno but ive never had em, plus free nights and i think weekends with 700 anyteime minutes a month, but hey i never use the thingy for long calls neway. plus i'd talk at night neway. umm going to mall soon to buy clothes and then gonna apply at TGIF, easy money and it's close. bye till l8er. still bummed.

caution, this post really just sucks. Yeah pathetic post i kno, but well I am. All my friends from church left 4 camp 2day and well i hang out with em' alot and well i have my driver's thingy all week and well here I am. They left this afternoon about 2, i stayed until they left. It was depressing. Parents were being jerks about me staying there to say goodbye, well whatever. So it's only a week so I'll see em' Saturday and all, but i'm gonna miss out on all the fun and jokes when they get back. but i'm close with em and all and i'm missing out just cause of some stupid test. uhh. im stopping this b4 i whine more/
